name: Thanatophobia (itch) (Pedro Iglesias)
description:
Thanatophobia is commonly referred to as the fear of death. More specifically, it can be a fear of death or a fear of the dying process. I've made this prototype for the UJI Game Jam and didn't finish for personal reasons.

There is no sound, music, enemies, dialog or history, just movement and graphics. You move with the WASD keys.
